title: The Dragon of Scrumption
description: Once upon a sweet sugary dream sat the town of Scrumption, below a mountain of ice cream.The Dragon of Scrumption is a delightfully entertaining story that parents and children are sure to enjoy reading, often. Read and rhyme along in this cute and funny book that is sure to instill a joy of reading. Follow young hero Axl as he embarks on a journey to save the town of Scrumption from the dragon.
author: M. Chesney
